account_deleted: Your account has now been deleted. No going back, but remember that you can make a new account at https://www.zsbgames.me/account/register.
delete_confirmation_email_sent: We've sent a confirmation email so you can delete your account. We'll miss you!
email_address_changed: Your email address has been changed. Until you confirm it, your account has been disabled.
email_already_confirmed: No need to keep clicking, we've got it already. Your email has been confirmed.
email_confirmation_code_incorrect: The email confirmation code was incorrect. Visit https://www.zsbgames.me/resend to resend the message
email_confirmation_code_resent: We've resent the account confirmation email. If it still doesn't work, check your spam folder and contact account_support@zsbgames.me
email_confirmed: Your email account has been confirmed. Log in at https://www.zsbgames.me/login and you can start playing right now!
email_in_use: The email address you entered is already in use. Are you sure you don't already have a ZSB account?
email_invalid: The email address you entered is invalid. It must be in the form of user@domain.tld
email_not_confirmed: Sorry, you have to confirm your email address before you can log in.
invalid_request: Something went wrong on our end. Try refreshing the page. If that doesn't work, contact website_support@zsbgames.me.
logged_in: Welcome back! You can download MP Tanks at https://mptanks.zsbgames.me/download or update your account details at https://www.zsbgames.me/account/settings
logged_out: You've been sucessfully logged out. Come back soon?
not_logged_in: You're not logged in right now. Visit https://www.zsbgames.me/login to log in.
password_too_short: The password you entered is a bit short. Try and make it at least 8 letters, ok?
unknown_error: We have absolutely no idea what went wrong. Like, none at all. Just email us at support@zsbgames.me so we can figure out what went wrong.
user_not_found: Hmm. We can't find you by your unique id. Try contacting website_support@zsbgames.me.
username_in_use: The username you entered is already in use. Are you sure you don't already have a ZSB account?
username_or_password_incorrect: An incorrect username or password was entered.
validation_incorrect: The answer you entered for the validation question is incorrect :/.
